Create a time-traveling bunny who is able to go back in time to help students improve their weaker subjects.
Develop an interactive game that teaches students how to identify and overcome their weaknesses.
Create a virtual reality experience that simulates real-world scenarios where students can practice overcoming their weaknesses.
Design a mobile app that uses artificial intelligence to analyze students' performance data and provide personalized recommendations for improving their weaknesses.
Create a peer mentoring program where stronger students mentor those who struggle with specific subjects.
